name: Pick Your Poison (itch) (Fatemah)
description:
Pick our poison is a multiplayers game that developed to follow the game jam theme ( evil vs evil ) with SDA and Coding Dojo Boot Camp 

Game Concept: its a Collaborative game where you choose your criminal to escape the underground prison but who will be the last one standing ?

 this game focuses on player manipulation in which they help each other then one will be betrayed. 

Team Members:

Fatemah Alghamdi | Designer, Visual and Game Feel 

Asala Almani | Producer, Programmer

Reema Almohanna | Artist, Narrative Writer 

Yara Alhussaini | Lead Programmer, Tech Support
